title: Urf Warwick
body: I used my Blue Essence to purchase the Urf WarWick skin. In the shop it says purchased but when i try to select it before a game it says unavailable. Any one else having this issue?

replies.body: Keep in mind there are 2 versions of that skin. You might have been trying to pick the original version called Urf the Manatee, which you won't be able to use unless you owned it back when it originally came out.
There are actually 2 versions of the skin, make sure you are selecting the one without the crown in the splash art when you are in champion select.
that was the issue. thank you very much!
